overview.headline: Our Methodology
overview.subheadline: Whether working on process optimization, SAP modernization, or AI governance, we follow a consistent approach that prioritizes business value and ensures execution.
overview.howToStart: Start with a 4–6 week Discovery Sprint. If value is real, continue with Portfolio + Leadership support.

discovery.headline: Discovery & Baseline
discovery.purpose: Use process mining, event analytics, and data intelligence to uncover what's actually driving rework, delays, and variants.
whatHappens: Extract and analyze operational data (process logs, system events, transactions)
Identify bottlenecks, waste, rework, and automation candidates
Build a prioritized portfolio of improvements with estimated business value
Define ownership, KPIs, and next steps
deliverables: Improvement opportunity list (ranked by value vs. effort)

engagement.scope: Fixed scope, focused on one business area or process

bestFor: Specific pain points that need immediate attention

portfolio.headline: Value-Based Portfolio
portfolio.purpose: Transform findings into a transparent improvement pipeline with clear business value, effort estimates, and ownership.
portfolio.description: Whether it's process improvements, SAP clean-core initiatives, architecture decisions, or AI use cases—every opportunity becomes a transparent initiative. You see exactly what's delivering results and what's stuck.
features: Clear business value for every initiative (time saved, cost reduced, risk mitigated)
outcomes: Transparent view of all improvement initiatives

governance.headline: Governance & Enablement
governance.purpose: Provide fractional leadership to keep your portfolio moving. We maintain oversight, track KPIs, manage risks, and ensure initiatives actually ship—not just get discussed.
whatHappens: Guide teams on prioritization and execution
bestFor: Need for ongoing architecture or governance oversight

valueTransparency.headline: Business Value Transparency
valueTransparency.description: We make business value visible and trackable.
how: Every initiative has clear value metrics (time saved, cost reduced, errors prevented)
Portfolio dashboards showing delivered value vs. pipeline
Honest assessment of what's working and what's not
valueTransparency.why: Many organizations have lots of analysis and plans, but struggle to connect them to measurable outcomes. We keep value front and center throughout every engagement.
